title: Enhanced Search and Filtering
description: Improved search functionality with real-time filtering, advanced filters by category and status, and better search result highlighting.

title: Better Error Messages
description: Redesigned error messages to be more user-friendly and actionable, with clear guidance on how to resolve common issues.

title: Fixed Mobile Search Issues
description: Resolved search bar functionality problems on mobile devices where typing wouldn't filter results properly.

title: Performance Optimizations
description: Reduced initial load time by 40% through code splitting, image optimization, and better caching strategies.

title: Roadmap Visualization
description: Brand new roadmap section with kanban-style board showing planned features organized by timeline (Now, Next, Later).

title: Voting System Enhancement
description: Improved voting mechanism with better visual feedback, vote count animations, and prevention of multiple votes.

title: Status Update Notifications
description: Fixed issue where users weren't receiving notifications when their submitted feedback status was updated.

title: UI Polish and Accessibility
description: Enhanced accessibility with better keyboard navigation, improved color contrast, and screen reader support throughout the application.
